```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(gogamer)
```

Default size is 5
```{r, fig.width=5, fig.height=5}
plotat(saikoyo, 116)
ggsave("script-ignored/output/test.pdf", width = 5, height = 5)
ggsave("script-ignored/output/test.png", width = 5, height = 5)
```

If fig.width and fig.height change, stone sizes are no good
```{r, fig.width=2, fig.height=2}
plotat(saikoyo, 116)
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
plotat(saikoyo, 116)
```


Use 'targetwidth' option to adjust the size
```{r, fig.width=2, fig.height=2}
plotat(saikoyo, 116, targetwidth = 2)
```

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
plotat(saikoyo, 116, targetwidth = 8)
```


More extreme cases
```{r, fig.width=1, fig.height=1}
plotat(saikoyo, 116, targetwidth = 1)
```

```{r, fig.width=20, fig.height=20}
plotat(saikoyo, 116, targetwidth = 20)
```
